tool_description:
API requires a username and password from http://www.carregistrationapi.com/ - please refer to  code examples and documentation from the official website. 

The API returns car registration data based on a number plate.  The API accesses government data in many countries worldwide, including the USA, UK, Australia, India and most of Europe.
name: Car Registration
title: Car Registration

api_list.name: Check UK number plate
